description.english: Complete the chapter "Preparations".
description.french: Terminer le chapitre "Préparations".
description.spanish: Completa el capítulo "Preparaciones".
description.schinese: 完成章节“准备工作”。

displayName.spanish: Otro Día Más en el Trabajo

description.english: Complete the chapter "Just Another Day at Work".
description.french: Terminer le chapitre "Une Journée Ordinaire".
description.spanish: Completa el capítulo "Otro Día Más en el Trabajo".
description.schinese: 完成章节“又一个工作日”。

description.english: Complete the chapter "Forgotten World".
description.french: Terminer le chapitre "Monde Oublié".
description.spanish: Completa el capítulo "Mundo Olvidado".
description.schinese: 完成章节“被遗忘的世界”。

description.english: Complete the chapter "Heavy Industry of the Past".
description.french: Terminer le chapitre "Industrie Lourde du Passé".
description.spanish: Completa el capítulo "Industria del Pasado".
description.schinese: 完成章节“过去的重工业”。

description.english: Complete the chapter "Fresh Water".
description.french: Terminer le chapitre "Au Fil de l'Eau".
description.spanish: Completa el capítulo "Agua Limpia".
description.schinese: 完成章节“淡水”。

description.english: Photograph 25% of all the photographable spots in Act 1 during the same playthrough.
description.french: Prendre en photo 25% de tous les points photographiables de l'Acte 1 durant la même partie.
description.spanish: Fotografía el 25% de todos los puntos fotografiables del Acto 1 en una misma partida.
description.schinese: 在第一幕的单次流程中拍摄到25%的可照相位置。
description.russian: Сфотографировать 25% всех фотографируемых точек в Первом акте за одно прохождение.

description.english: Photograph 50% of all the photographable spots in Act 1 during the same playthrough.
description.french: Prendre en photo 50% de tous les points photographiables de l'Acte 1 durant la même partie.
description.spanish: Fotografía el 50% de todos los puntos fotografiables del Acto 1 en una misma partida.
description.schinese: 在第一幕的单次流程中拍摄到50%的可照相位置。
description.russian: Сфотографировать 50% всех фотографируемых точек в Первом акте за одно прохождение.

description.english: Photograph 90% of all the photographable spots in Act 1 during the same playthrough.
description.french: Prendre en photo 90% de tous les points photographiables de l'Acte 1 durant la même partie.
description.spanish: Fotografía el 90% de todos los puntos fotografiables del Acto 1 en una misma partida.
description.schinese: 在第一幕的单次流程中拍摄到90%的可照相位置。
description.russian: Сфотографировать 90% всех фотографируемых точек в Первом акте за одно прохождение

description.english: Uncover 90% of all the corruption tapes and documents in Act 1 during the same playthrough.
description.french: Découvrir 90% des cassettes et documents de corruption de l'Acte 1 durant la même partie.
description.spanish: Descubre el 90% de todas las cintas y documentos sobre corrupción del Acto 1 en una misma partida.
description.schinese: 在第一幕的单次流程中发现了90%的腐败记录录音带以及文档。
description.russian: Обнаружить 90% всех коррупционных материалов в Первом акте за одно прохождение.

description.english: Find 90% of all the hidden geocaches in Act 1 during the same playthrough.
description.french: Trouver 90% de toutes les géocaches de l'Acte 1 durant la même partie.
description.spanish: Encuentra el 90% de todos los geocachés del Acto 1 en una misma partida.
description.schinese: 在第一幕的单次流程中发现了90%的隐藏地质遗迹。
description.russian: Найти 90% геокэш-тайников в Первом акте за одно прохождение.

description.english: Repair 90% of all the repairable spots in Act 1 during the same playthrough.
description.french: Réparer 90% de tous les points réparables de l'Acte 1 durant la même partie.
description.spanish: Repara el 90% de todos los puntos reparables del Acto 1 en una misma partida.
description.schinese: 在第一幕的单次流程中修复了90%的可修复位置。
description.russian: Починить 90% возможного в Первом акте за одно прохождение.

description.english: At the Hammer Valley Dam, toss the elevator fuse into the slot from the upper end of the stairs.
description.french: Au barrage de Hammer Valley, lancer le fusible de l'ascenseur dans son compartiment depuis le haut des escaliers.
description.spanish: En la Presa Hammer Valley, tira el fusible del ascensor desde escaleras arriba hasta su ranura.
description.schinese: 在重锤谷水坝里把电梯保险丝从楼梯的上端扔到槽里。
description.russian: Находясь на дамбе Хаммер Вэли, закинуть предохранитель для лифта в нужный слот с верхней части лестницы.

description.english: At the Hammer Valley Dam, get across the generator room without moving the boxes.
description.french: Dans le barrage de Hammer Valley, traverser la salle des générateurs sans bouger de caisses.
description.spanish: En la Presa Hammer Valley, llega al otro lado de la sala del generador sin mover las cajas.
description.schinese: 在重锤谷水坝的发电机室内不移动任何箱子通过。
description.russian: Находясь на дамбе Хаммер Вэли, пробраться через зал с генератором не перемещая ящики.

description.english: Repair all the water flow meters in Act 1 during the same playthrough.
description.french: Réparer tous les débitmètres de l'Acte 1 durant la même partie.
description.spanish: Repara todos los medidores de caudal del Acto 1 en una misma partida.
description.schinese: 在第一幕的单次流程中修复所有水流量计。
description.russian: Починить все датчики потока воды в Первом акте за одно прохождение.

description.english: Get through the Hacker Den without triggering any of the alarms.
description.french: Traverser le Repaire des Hackers sans déclencher d'alarme.
description.spanish: Atraviesa la Guarida del Hacker sin activar ninguna alarma.
description.schinese: 在不触发任何警报的情况下通过黑客巢穴。
description.russian: Пробраться через Логово Хакера, не активируя сигнализацию.

description.english: Complete Act 1.
description.french: Terminer INFRA : Acte 1.
description.spanish: Completa el Acto 1.
description.schinese: 完成第一幕。

displayName.english: A Bad Case of the Mondays

description.english: At the office, jump down from the 8th or 7th floor.
description.french: Au bureau, sauter depuis le 8ème ou 7ème étage.
description.spanish: En la oficina, tírate desde el piso 8 o 7.
description.schinese: 在办公室的8楼或者7楼纵身跳下。
description.russian: Находясь в офисе, спрыгнуть вниз с 8-го или 7-го этажа.

description.english: Analyze a water sample at the Pitheath Water Treatment Plant and document the results.
description.french: Analyser un échantillon d'eau à la station d'épuration de Pitheath et documenter les résultats.
description.spanish: Analiza una muestra del agua en la Planta de Tratamiento de Agua Pitheath y documenta los resultados.
description.schinese: 在皮特西斯净水厂分析水样本并记录检测报告。
description.russian: Изучить образец воды на Водоочистной станции Питхит и задокументировать результаты.

description.english: Eat the kebab roll at the Pitheath Water Treatment Plant.
description.french: Manger le kebab à la station d'épuration de Pitheath.
description.spanish: Cómete el rollo de kebab en la Planta de Tratamiento de Agua Pitheath.
description.russian: Съесть кебаб на Водоочистной станции Питхит.

displayName.spanish: Disfruta de Osmo Olut Bien Frío
displayName.schinese: 享受冰凉的奥斯莫啤酒

description.english: Experience the effect of Osmo Olut.
description.french: Ressentez l'effet Osmo Olut.
description.spanish: Experimenta el efecto de Osmo Olut.

description.english: Find the lost dock.
description.french: Trouver le radeau perdu.
description.spanish: Encuentra el muelle perdido.

description.english: Find some money hidden by Hartman.
description.french: Trouver de l'argent caché par Hartman.
description.spanish: Encuentra el dinero escondido de Hartman.

description.english: Grab the USB stick from the Hacker Den.
description.french: Voler la clé USB du Repaire des Hackers.
description.spanish: Llévate el pendrive USB de la Guarida del Hacker.

description.english: Make your own tunnel in the Bergmann water tunnels.
description.french: Faites votre propre tunnel dans le tunnel d'eau Bergmann.
description.spanish: Haz tu propio túnel en los túneles de agua Bergmann.
description.schinese: 在贝格曼输水隧道中制造属于你自己的隧道。
description.russian: Пробить свой собственный тоннель в водных тоннелях Бергмана.

description.english: Fix the problems at the Pine Fell Water Plant and get back underground without disrupting the operation.
description.french: Réparer tous les problèmes de la station de pompage de Pine Fell et retourner sous terre sans interrompre l'opération.
description.spanish: Arregla los problemas de la Planta de Agua Pine Fell y accede al subterráneo sin interrumpir su funcionamiento.
description.schinese: 修复所有松落净水厂的问题并在回到地下的时候没有扰乱到行动的进行。
description.russian: Исправить проблемы на Водонапорной станции Пайн Фэл и вернуться назад в подземку без нарушения подачи воды.

description.english: Disregard the office rules at the Pitheath Water Treatment Plant.
description.french: Ignorer le règlement du bureau de la station d'épuration de Pitheath.
description.spanish: Haz caso omiso de las reglas en la Planta de Tratamiento de Agua Pitheath.
description.russian: Проигнорировать офисные правила на Водоочистной станции Питхит.

description.english: Turn on the generators at Hammer Valley Dam and successfully connect the plant to the grid.
description.french: Activer tous les générateurs au barrage de Hammer Valley et reconnecter l'installation au réseau électrique.
description.spanish: Enciende los generadores de la presa Hammer Valley y conéctalos a la red.
description.schinese: 在重锤谷水坝启动发电机并成功连接反应堆到系统网格。
description.russian: Запустить генераторы на дамбе Хаммер Вэли и успешно подключить станцию к сети.

description.english: Cause a disaster at the Hammer Valley Dam.
description.french: Causer un désastre au barrage de Hammer Valley.
description.spanish: Causa un desastre en la presa Hammer Valley.
description.russian: Вызвать аварию на дамбе Хаммер Вэли.

description.english: Complete the chapter "Public Transport".
description.french: Terminer le chapitre "Transports Publics".
description.spanish: Completa el capítulo "Transporte Público".
description.schinese: 完成章节“公共运输”。

description.english: Complete the chapter "Working Overtime".
description.french: Terminer le chapitre "Heures Supplémentaires".
description.spanish: Completa el capítulo "Trabajando Horas Extra".
description.schinese: 完场章节“加班”。

description.english: Photograph 25% of all the photographable spots in Act 2 during the same playthrough.
description.french: Prendre en photo 25% de tous les points photographiables de l'Acte 2 durant la même partie.
description.spanish: Fotografía el 25% de todos los puntos fotografiables del Acto 2 en una misma partida.
description.schinese: 在第二幕的单次流程中拍摄到25%的可照相位置。
description.russian: Сфотографировать 25% всех фотографируемых точек во Втором акте за одно прохождение.

description.english: Photograph 50% of all the photographable spots in Act 2 during the same playthrough.
description.french: Prendre en photo 50% de tous les points photographiables de l'Acte 2 durant la même partie.
description.spanish: Fotografía el 50% de todos los puntos fotografiables del Acto 2 en una misma partida.
description.schinese: 在第二幕的单次流程中拍摄到50%的可照相位置。
description.russian: Сфотографировать 50% всех фотографируемых точек во Втором акте за одно прохождение.

description.english: Photograph 90% of all the photographable spots in Act 2 during the same playthrough.
description.french: Prendre en photo 90% de tous les points photographiables de l'Acte 2 durant la même partie.
description.spanish: Fotografía el 90% de todos los puntos fotografiables del Acto 2 en una misma partida.
description.schinese: 在第二幕的单次流程中拍摄到90%的可照相位置。
description.russian: Сфотографировать 90% всех фотографируемых точек во Втором акте за одно прохождение.

description.english: Uncover 90% of all the corruption tapes and documents in Act 2 during the same playthrough.
description.french: Découvrir 90% des cassettes et documents de corruption de l'Acte 2 durant la même partie.
description.spanish: Descubre el 90% de todas las cintas y documentos sobre corrupción del Acto 2 en una misma partida.
description.schinese: 在第二幕的单次流程中发现了90%的腐败记录录音带以及文档。
description.russian: Обнаружить 90% всех коррупционных материалов во Втором акте за одно прохождение.

description.english: Find all of the hidden geocaches in Act 2 during the same playthrough.
description.french: Trouver toutes les géocaches de l'Acte 2 durant la même partie.
description.spanish: Encuentra el 90% de todos los geocachés del Acto 2 en una misma partida.
description.schinese: 在第二幕的单次流程中发现了90%的隐藏地质遗迹。
description.russian: Найти все геокэш-тайники во Втором акте за одно прохождение.

description.english: Repair 90% of all the repairable spots in Act 2 during the same playthrough.
description.french: Réparer 90% de tous les points réparables de l'Acte 2 durant la même partie.
description.spanish: Repara el 90% de todos los puntos reparables del Acto 2 en una misma partida.
description.schinese: 在第二幕的单次流程中修复了90%的可修复位置。
description.russian: Починить 90% возможного во Втором акте за одно прохождение.

description.english: Complete Act 2.
description.french: Terminer INFRA : Acte 2.
description.spanish: Completa el Acto 2.
description.schinese: 完成第二幕。

displayName.schinese: 谨言慎行不吃亏，轻率莽撞必后悔

description.english: Buy a metro ticket just in case.
description.french: Acheter un ticket de métro, au cas où.
description.spanish: Compra un billete de metro por si acaso.
description.russian: На всякий случай купить билет в метро.

description.english: Complete the beer challenge.
description.french: Terminer le défi des bières.
description.spanish: Completa el desafío de la cerveza.

description.english: Supply the city with fresh water.
description.french: Alimenter la ville en eau claire.
description.spanish: Suministra agua limpia a la ciudad.
description.schinese: 为整个城市供应淡水。

description.english: Watch the video left behind by Jeff Walter.
description.french: Regarder la vidéo laissée par Jeff Walter.
description.spanish: Mira el vídeo dejado por Jeff Walter.

description.english: Receive a lethal dose of radiation.
description.french: Recevoir une dose mortelle de radiations.
description.spanish: Recibe una dosis letal de radiación.

description.english: Visit the scientist accommodation wing in the bunker complex.
description.french: Visiter l'aile d'hébergement des scientifiques dans le bunker.
description.spanish: Visita el ala de alojamiento de los científicos en el complejo del búnker.
description.russian: Посетить жилое крыло учёных в бункере.

description.english: Drink a lot of coffee.
description.french: Boire beaucoup de café.
description.spanish: Bebe un montón de café.
description.schinese: 喝了很多咖啡。

description.english: Find this thing.
description.french: Trouver cette chose.
description.spanish: Encuentra esta cosa.

description.english: Take a sip of the special coffee grind.
description.french: Boire une gorgée de café spécial.
description.spanish: Toma un sorbo del café molido especial.

description.english: Fix all the problems at the Pitheath Water Treatment Plant.
description.french: Réparer tous les problèmes de la station d'épuration de Pitheath.
description.spanish: Arregla todos los problemas de la Planta de Tratamiento de Agua Pitheath.
description.schinese: 修复皮特西斯净水厂的所有问题。
description.russian: Исправить все проблемы на Водоочистной станции Питхит.

description.english: Complete the chapter "Late for a Meeting".
description.french: Terminer le chapitre "Réunion Tardive".
description.spanish: Completa el capítulo "Tarde Para Una Reunión".
description.schinese: 完成章节“开会迟到”。

description.english: Complete the chapter "To Save a City".
description.french: Terminer le chapitre "Une Ville en Danger".
description.spanish: Completa el capítulo "Salvar Una Ciudad".
description.schinese: 完成章节“拯救城市”。

description.english: Complete the chapter "Redemption".
description.french: Terminer le chapitre "Rédemption".
description.spanish: Completa el capítulo "Redención".
description.schinese: 完成章节“救赎”。

description.english: Photograph 25% of all the photographable spots in Act 3 during the same playthrough.
description.french: Prendre en photo 25% de tous les points photographiables de l'Acte 3 durant la même partie.
description.spanish: Fotografía el 25% de todos los puntos fotografiables del Acto 3 en una misma partida.
description.schinese: 在第三幕的单次流程中拍摄到25%的可照相位置。
description.russian: Сфотографировать 25% всех фотографируемых точек в Третьем акте за одно прохождение.

description.english: Photograph 50% of all the photographable spots in Act 3 during the same playthrough.
description.french: Prendre en photo 50% de tous les points photographiables de l'Acte 3 durant la même partie.
description.spanish: Fotografía el 50% de todos los puntos fotografiables del Acto 3 en una misma partida.
description.schinese: 在第三幕的单次流程中拍摄到50%的可照相位置。
description.russian: Сфотографировать 50% всех фотографируемых точек в Третьем акте за одно прохождение.

description.english: Photograph 90% of all the photographable spots in Act 3 during the same playthrough.
description.french: Prendre en photo 90% de tous les points photographiables de l'Acte 3 durant la même partie.
description.spanish: Fotografía el 90% de todos los puntos fotografiables del Acto 3 en una misma partida.
description.schinese: 在第三幕的单次流程中拍摄到90%的可照相位置。
description.russian: Сфотографировать 90% всех фотографируемых точек в Третьем акте за одно прохождение.

description.english: Uncover 90% of all the corruption tapes and documents in Act 3 during the same playthrough.
description.french: Découvrir 90% des cassettes et documents de corruption de l'Acte 3 durant la même partie.
description.spanish: Descubre el 90% de todas las cintas y documentos sobre corrupción del Acto 3 en una misma partida.
description.schinese: 在第三幕的单次流程中发现了90%的腐败记录录音带以及文档。
description.russian: Обнаружить 90% всех коррупционных материалов в Третьем акте за одно прохождение.

description.english: Find 90% of all the hidden geocaches in Act 3 during the same playthrough.
description.french: Trouver 90% de toutes les géocaches de l'Acte 3 durant la même partie.
description.spanish: Encuentra el 90% de todos los geocachés del Acto 3 en una misma partida.
description.schinese: 在第三幕的单次流程中发现了90%的隐藏地质遗迹。
description.russian: Найти 90% геокэш-тайников в Третьем акте за одно прохождение.

description.english: Repair 90% of all the repairable spots in Act 3 during the same playthrough.
description.french: Réparer 90% de tous les points réparables de l'Acte 3 durant la même partie.
description.spanish: Repara el 90% de todos los puntos reparables del Acto 3 en una misma partida.
description.schinese: 在第三幕的单次流程中修复了90%的可修复位置。
description.russian: Починить 90% возможного в Третьем акте за одно прохождение.

description.english: Complete INFRA.
description.french: Terminer INFRA.
description.spanish: Completa INFRA.
description.schinese: 完成“基建危机”。

description.english: Complete INFRA.
description.french: Terminer INFRA.
description.spanish: Completa INFRA.
description.schinese: 完成“基建危机”。

description.english: Complete INFRA.
description.french: Terminer INFRA.
description.spanish: Completa INFRA.
description.schinese: 完成“基建危机”。

description.english: Atone for all your sins.
description.french: Expiez vos péchés.
description.spanish: Expía todos tus pecados.

description.english: Leave Robin to his fate.
description.french: Laisser Robin à son sort.
description.spanish: Abandona a Robin a su suerte.
description.schinese: 抛弃罗宾并任其自生自灭。
description.russian: Оставить Робина наедине со своей судьбой.

description.english: Save Robin's life.
description.french: Sauver la vie de Robin.
description.spanish: Sálvale la vida a Robin.
description.schinese: 拯救罗宾的生命。

description.english: Break into the battery store.
description.french: S'introduire dans le magasin de batteries.
description.spanish: Irrumpe en la tienda de baterías.
description.schinese: 闯入电池商店。

description.english: Find Xeander Berg's hideout.
description.french: Trouver la cachette de Xeander Berg.
description.spanish: Encuentra el escondite de Xeander Berg.

description.english: Take a sip of the mushroom tea.
description.french: Boire une gorgée de thé au champignons.
description.spanish: Bebe un sorbo de té de setas.

description.english: Quack!
description.french: Coin !
description.spanish: ¡Cuac!

description.english: Help out Rob with his gift.
description.french: Aider Rob avec son cadeau.
description.spanish: Ayuda a Rob con su regalo.

description.english: Discover the results of excessive mushroom usage.
description.french: Découvrez les résultats de l'abus de champignons.
description.spanish: Descubre los resultados de un uso excesivo de setas.
description.russian: Столкнуться с последствиями частого употребления грибов.

description.english: Win the jackpot on the slot machine.
description.french: Gagner le gros lot à la machine à sous.
description.spanish: Gana el premio gordo en la máquina tragaperras.
description.schinese: 在自动贩卖机中赢得头奖。

description.english: Uncover the secrets of the Villa.
description.french: Révélez les secrets de la villa.
description.spanish: Revela los secretos de la Villa.

description.english: Help Carla and Amit.
description.french: Aider Carla et Amit.
description.spanish: Ayuda a Carla y Amit.
description.schinese: 帮助卡拉与阿密特。

description.english: Enter the S.N.W. control room.
description.french: Pénétrez dans la salle de contrôle du S.N.W.
description.spanish: Accede a la sala de control del S.N.W.

description.english: Bzzzzt!
description.french: Bzzzzt !
description.spanish: ¡Bzzzzt!
